column4: Is there a default root password for ubuntu linux?  I installed Ubuntu (my first dive into linux) and now as I'm trying to learn my way around I'm unable to switch to the root user using the bash shell su command.
Yeah I had figured it would be the same, but I keep getting authorization failures.  Maybe I'm typing something wrong.
Okay that explains it.  Thanks  Do I have all the root ability with my default account?
yes, u can do sudo <any command>
